newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia June palm oil exports at 634,753 tonnes.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia June palm oil exports at 634,753 tonnes.

text.p: Cargo surveyor Caleb Brett put Malaysia's June bulk palm oil exports at 634,753 tonnes against its estimate of 641,950 tonnes for May, traders said.
The figures include laurics and oleochemicals but exclude shipments to Singapore and exports in drum, said the traders who obtained the data by facsimile.
The Palm Oil Registration and Licensing Authority put official May exports at 626,606 tonnes.
